string-array.name: gametips
string-array.item: Press the back key on the main screen to enter the opening menu, select settings and uncheck the G-senor to turn off auto-screen-rotations.
Click the player avatar on the main screen then you will find the option to change your current password.
Reset will clear all user information, click the player avatar to find that option.
If you lost your password, you can retrieve it by going into the login option from the opening screen.
Items bought from the shop will be equipped automatically.
To switch equips, click on the altar of heroes (the golden statue) and select the equips.
To switch spells, click on the altar of heroes (the golden statue) and select the spells.
You will be awarded mojos upon completion of all daily tasks.
"Your hero gains honor by killing enemies,honor points can be exchanged at the altar for hero's ability."
Plants that increase population will also occasionally drop resources.
Visit your friends and you will have the chance to collect fallen resources.
You may gain prizes if you visit friends and help open the treasure box.
While visiting your friends, you can help speed up their productions.
While visiting your friends, you can help them secure soilders and resources.
You will get a free spin at the lottery after each period of time.
During the protection period, no troops will be lost during battle.
Conquest time will vary according to different geographic locations
After a successful conquest, you can collect tax from your prisoner regularly.
After a successful conquest, you can enslave the other player and demand he/she to produce resources
"You can check enemy's formation before attempting to win castle back."
Retreating from a battle in the arena will count as a loss.
Upgrading military buildings can shorten production time and unlock new units.
Upgrading gold and crystal mines can increase its production efficiency.
If you are running out of resources, you can spend MOJOs as an alternative.
When setting up formation, click load button,you will see formation in the last battle.
The amount of MOJO needed to speed up productions will vary according to the production time.
Buildings can catch on fire after being occupied. If fire is not put out, the building will be gone.
The battle is lost once the castle wall is destroyed.
There are four types of armors: cloth armor, light armor, heavy armor and hero armor.
There are four types of attacks: normal attack, piercing attack, magic attack and hero attack.
Normal attack counters light armor, for example, footmen bring more damage to ninjas.
Piercing attack counters cloth armor, for example, archers bring more damage to trolls.
Magic attack counters heavy armor, for example, mages bring more damage to knights.
Cloth armor counters magic attack, for example, trolls suffer less damage from mages.
Light armor counters piercing attack, for example, footmen suffer less damage from archers.
Heavy armor counters normal attack, for example, knights suffer less damage from footmen.
Hero armor counters every non-hero attacks.
Items and spells have durability levels, they need to be repaired once they are worn out.
The durability of items and spells decreases over time.
You can spend gold/crystals or MOJOs to repair your items or spells.
The more MOJOs you buy at a time, the bigger the discount.
The Behemoth has the highest health points and defense spells, he hits enemies of two rows at the same time.
The Berserker has the highest attack points with the range of two blocks.Recommand to place on the battlefield.
The Succubus has the longest attack range which enables her to attack enemies from afar.
Placing your hero strategically will effectively prevent your enemies from invasion.
Review glorious battles or try to learn the tactical,select the attack/defense report from the mail icon and everything is recorded.
Shattering strike is best utilized facing the melee units.
There are only three slots for spells, use them wisely.
You can sell useless items at the altar or shop.
There are ways to gain free MOJOs at the shop.
There is a chance to win MOJOs from the lottery.
Not-for-sale equips can only be won through lottery.
"Summoning types of spells can reinforce units and block enemy's invasion at crucial moments."
Scourage of doom can damage enemy efficiently.

string-array.name: str_1000
string-array.item: A rusty, old helmet made from iron

string-array.name: str_1001
string-array.item: A giant hammer with rivets made from iron

string-array.name: str_1002
string-array.item: A skull necklace made from iron

string-array.name: str_1003
string-array.item: A pair of spiked spaulders made from iron

string-array.name: str_1004
string-array.item: A pair of useful wristbands made from iron

string-array.name: str_1005
string-array.item: A heavy helmet worn by an unknown berserker

string-array.name: str_1006
string-array.item: A fractured but powerful axe once used by an unknown berserker

string-array.name: str_1007
string-array.item: A piece of heavy armor worn by an unknown berserker

string-array.name: str_1008
string-array.item: A pair of wide spaulders worn by an unknown berserker

string-array.name: str_1009
string-array.item: A pair of wide wristbands worn by an unknown berserker

string-array.name: str_1010
string-array.item: An autographed helmet worn by Willy the famous football player

string-array.name: str_1011
string-array.item: "Willy's favorite club, used not only to play golf but also..."

string-array.name: str_1013
string-array.item: Large football shoulder pads worn by Big Shoulders Willy

string-array.name: str_1014
string-array.item: "Red and white were Willy's favorite colors"

string-array.name: str_1015
string-array.item: "According to legend, this helmet was forged in the flames of hell and fire will shoot out of the user's eyes"

string-array.name: str_1016
string-array.item: This hammer from hell was used to shatter the earth and brings forth doom

string-array.name: str_1017
string-array.item: Legend has it that the user of this armor will be consumed in flames while gaining his power of hell

string-array.name: str_1018
string-array.item: Rumor has it that these spaulders were made from the teeth of hellhounds and lava

string-array.name: str_1019
string-array.item: These wristbands still whispers the sounds of hell

string-array.name: str_1020
string-array.item: Discovered in the depths of a crystal mine, stronger than any other metal hammer

string-array.name: str_1021
string-array.item: You say it is made out of cotton, but why does it deal so much damage?

string-array.name: str_1022
string-array.item: "It's a promotion gift from the shopping mall"

string-array.name: str_1023
string-array.item: "Be aware, these sun-glasses belonged to a boss, but wearing them won't necessarily make you a boss"

string-array.name: str_1024
string-array.item: A weapon used by Death to harvest souls, it contains countless souls of despair

string-array.name: str_1025
string-array.item: A large spiked club used by the legendary giant troll captain

string-array.name: str_1026
string-array.item: Only the most fortunate ones will get the chance to witness it

string-array.name: str_1027
string-array.item: A stone crushing hammer made from a gigantic piece of metal

string-array.name: str_1028
string-array.item: Wearing this armor will allow you to endure tremendous amount of damage

string-array.name: str_1029
string-array.item: Spiked spaulders made from the pure steel

string-array.name: str_1030
string-array.item: Wearing these wristbands lets you crush rocks with your bare hands

string-array.name: str_1100
string-array.item: A majestic and cold helmet made from silver

string-array.name: str_1101
string-array.item: A silver sword decorated with gold jewels

string-array.name: str_1102
string-array.item: The usual knight armor, full of awe and solemnity

string-array.name: str_1103
string-array.item: The aerodynamic design better protects the shoulder area

string-array.name: str_1104
string-array.item: These premium wristbands provide protection even to your fingers

string-array.name: str_1105
string-array.item: The distinctive skull, the white parrot feather, these will turn you right into a captain

string-array.name: str_1106
string-array.item: The last image the victims see are their twisted expressions reflected on the blade

string-array.name: str_1107
string-array.item: This jacket will make you feel light as a feather

string-array.name: str_1108
string-array.item: Jack adds a stroke on the patch for every killing he made

string-array.name: str_1109
string-array.item: Jack loved red and black, he believed they bring good luck

string-array.name: str_1110
string-array.item: In short, this is a strange looking hat

string-array.name: str_1111
string-array.item: A clogged toilet? Here I come!

string-array.name: str_1112
string-array.item: A famous video game character once wore these to save a princess

string-array.name: str_1113
string-array.item: These weird pads seems to be made out of used cans and broken nails

string-array.name: str_1114
string-array.item: Legend has it that once you wear it,you go insane

string-array.name: str_1115
string-array.item: Made from the bones of an ancient spirit, it will corrupt the soul of the wearer

string-array.name: str_1116
string-array.item: The soul of the victims fly around the sword

string-array.name: str_1117
string-array.item: The user of this armor is both cursed and protected by the fallen spirit

string-array.name: str_1118
string-array.item: The resting spirits are awakened once they find a new owner

string-array.name: str_1119
string-array.item: They will melt into your wrists upon the exchange of the soul for the power

string-array.name: str_1120
string-array.item: This weapon makes off distinctive humming sound, having a high-tech sense

string-array.name: str_1121
string-array.item: An old scarred helmet stained with blood and dirt, still usable

string-array.name: str_1122
string-array.item: Forged in the shape of a half moon, this blade is easy to wield

string-array.name: str_1123
string-array.item: "A large weapon uniquely forged by a savage tribe from the south, doesn't feel light waving it"

string-array.name: str_1124
string-array.item: A-thousand-old blade owned by a royal family, feels the weight of history by just holding it

string-array.name: str_1125
string-array.item: Your soul will vanish just by staring into this mask

string-array.name: str_1126
string-array.item: It can take lives and collect souls

string-array.name: str_1127
string-array.item: The user of this armor will immediately blend into the surrounding darkness

string-array.name: str_1128
string-array.item: You will be rewarded with a killing instinct after wearing these spaulders

string-array.name: str_1129
string-array.item: "A pair of cold wristbands,feels like it's made of shadow"

string-array.name: str_1200
string-array.item: A headdress made from hundred-year-old ivies

string-array.name: str_1201
string-array.item: The pretty pedals are deceiving, the sharp thorns are deadly

string-array.name: str_1202
string-array.item: A piece of armor made from hundred-year-old ivies, strong and seductive

string-array.name: str_1203
string-array.item: A pair of strange wings made from hundred-year-old ivies

string-array.name: str_1204
string-array.item: "Even though they contain piercing thorns, it doesn't bother those seeking their power"

string-array.name: str_1205
string-array.item: According to legend, the horn of such animal brings good luck

string-array.name: str_1206
string-array.item: They bearer of this weapon feels as if he/she has the power to control destiny

string-array.name: str_1207
string-array.item: A white armor made from unicorn skin, light and sturdy

string-array.name: str_1208
string-array.item: Only a adult unicorn will grow wings, they sparkle while flying

string-array.name: str_1209
string-array.item: A pair of strong wristbands made from unicorn bone

string-array.name: str_1210
string-array.item: My butt aches every time I see a woman wear this cap

string-array.name: str_1211
string-array.item: Seems like a cute heartshape, but looks are deceiving

string-array.name: str_1212
string-array.item: Pink skirt with white stockings, hmm, this reminds me of something

string-array.name: str_1213
string-array.item: Wings of an angel, makes you want to touch it

string-array.name: str_1214
string-array.item: Girls will certainly love this design

string-array.name: str_1215
string-array.item: Those who dare to stare straight at this mask will be dragged into ever-lasting darkness

string-array.name: str_1216
string-array.item: Darkness have already surrounded you the moment you set eyes on them

string-array.name: str_1217
string-array.item: The bearer will be consumed by darkness while gaining its power

string-array.name: str_1218
string-array.item: Storm and rain can be summoned while wielding this pair of wings

string-array.name: str_1219
string-array.item: "We cannot tell what it's made of, but it's filled with dark energy"

string-array.name: str_1220
string-array.item: You will feel smarter after changing into this hairstyle

string-array.name: str_1221
string-array.item: A perfect look for costume parties

string-array.name: str_1222
string-array.item: This magical treasure was once lost by the sea and the fisherman found it as a starfish and took it to the market

string-array.name: str_1223
string-array.item: Found in the depths of an ice cave, this distinctive item can freeze everything that surrounds it

string-array.name: str_1224
string-array.item: A legendary skull from an ancient sacrifice, flame still flickers in its eyes

string-array.name: str_1225
string-array.item: A spirit bearing the soul of the fallen red dragon, it still cannot be tamed

string-array.name: str_1226
string-array.item: A headdress made from lava, it is filled with evil powers

string-array.name: str_1227
string-array.item: Only dead people can see it

string-array.name: str_1228
string-array.item: A strong and elegant piece of armor, with strong sense of molten lava

string-array.name: str_1229
string-array.item: Flapping this pair of wings will take away winds of sands

string-array.name: str_1230
string-array.item: A pair of elegant wristbands, it has a strong scent of evil

string-array.name: str_300
string-array.item: Even though smoking is bad for health, Wuba has never stopped smoking, but he was never to be seen again after his defeat

string-array.name: str_301
string-array.item: "The shaman who rubbed fallen warriors' blood on this amulet once said that the bearer of this item will become immortal"

string-array.name: str_302
string-array.item: This magical green necklace was worn by the queen of wind during her conquest in the deserts

string-array.name: str_303
string-array.item: A majestic ring made from gold and ruby, a gift for the royal family

string-array.name: str_304
string-array.item: There was once an ancient empire called the Copper Lion Empire, their grand king once wore this talisman

string-array.name: str_305
string-array.item: "Made in the shape of the Elf king's favorite three leaf clover, it was worn by the king untill his empire was destroyed"

string-array.name: str_306
string-array.item: "A thousand years after Wade had turned into a zombie, all that's left of him is this hand"

string-array.name: str_307
string-array.item: After the dwarfs had finished forging a giant axe for their king, they made this ring from the scrap metal

string-array.name: str_308
string-array.item: After the blue dragon was slaughtered, a shaman made this one-off ring from the finest blue dragon scale and pearls

string-array.name: str_309
string-array.item: "A heart dug from the corpse of a flame dragon, it will evaporate everything around it if it's not contained in a silver case"

string-array.name: str_400
string-array.item: Summons the spirits of fallen footmen from the castle wall, the spirits lasts for a short time

string-array.name: str_401
string-array.item: Summons the spirits of fallen trolls from the castle wall, the spirits lasts for a short time

string-array.name: str_402
string-array.item: Summons the spirits of fallen archers at the castle wall, the spirits lasts for a short time

string-array.name: str_403
string-array.item: A fire magic attack that focuses all of the fire element in the air and releases that energy blast onto forward enemies, deals

string-array.name: str_404
string-array.item: An electric magic attack which creates an electric flow that pierces through target enemies, deals

string-array.name: str_405
string-array.item: An exploding spiritual magic attack that causes meteors to rain down on target enemies, hits 3 times each deals

string-array.name: str_406
string-array.item: A healing magic that gathers a holy light around ally units and heals them, heals life points

string-array.name: str_407
string-array.item: "A melee attack that gathers all of the hero's strength into one strike against nearby enemies, deals"

string-array.name: str_408
string-array.item: A voodoo magic attack that commands goblins to toss chemical explosives onto target enemies, deals

string-array.name: str_409
string-array.item: A fire magic attack that focuses all the flare element in the air and releases that energy blast onto forward enemies, deals

string-array.name: str_410
string-array.item: A fire magic attack that focuses all the flame element in the air and releases that energy blast onto forward enemies, deals

string-array.name: str_411
string-array.item: An exploding magic attack that causes blue orbs to rain down on target enemies, hits 3 times each deals

string-array.name: str_412
string-array.item: An exploding magic attack that causes demonic orbs to rain down on target enemies, hits 3 times each deals

string-array.name: str_413
string-array.item: A voodoo magic attack that commands goblins to toss red explosives onto target enemies, deals

string-array.name: str_414
string-array.item: "A melee attack that gathers all of the hero's strength into one smash against nearby enemies, deals"

string-array.name: str_415
string-array.item: A voodoo magic attack that commands goblins to toss purple explosives onto target enemies, deals

string-array.name: str_416
string-array.item: "A melee attack that gathers all of the hero's strength into one bash against nearby enemies, deals"

string-array.name: str_house
string-array.item: A basic shelter for troops, it increases population limit.

string-array.name: str_gold_mine
string-array.item: This gold mining facility is essential for collecting gold.

string-array.name: str_crystal_mine
string-array.item: Crystal is a precious resource, it requires special mining techniques to harvest.

string-array.name: str_cage
string-array.item: Hold another player captive and obtain extra income. It cannot be sold once it is built.

string-array.name: str_barrack
string-array.item: Footmen can be recruited after construction, upgrade to recruit Trolls.

string-array.name: str_range
string-array.item: Archers can be recruited after construction, upgrade to recruit Ninjas.

string-array.name: str_library
string-array.item: Priests can be recruited after construction, upgrade to recruit Mages.

string-array.name: str_stable
string-array.item: Knights can be recruited after construction, upgrade to recruit Wolf Riders.

string-array.name: str_magic_temple
string-array.item: Shamans can be recruited after construction, upgrade to recruit Archangels.

string-array.name: str_mech_lab
string-array.item: Iron Wheels can be recruited after construction, upgrade to recruit Troll Cycorgs.

string-array.name: str_tree4
string-array.item: You will often find ladybugs lying on its green leaves

string-array.name: str_tree
string-array.item: Ordinary tree, it improves the scenery and brings pleasant surprises.

string-array.name: str_tree1
string-array.item: Abundant in the North, it brings fortune.

string-array.name: str_tree2
string-array.item: "Grows in the South, it's an eye candy."

string-array.name: str_brick2
string-array.item: These clay jugs are made by a native tribe, very colorful.

string-array.name: str_tree3
string-array.item: Coconuts are expected to fall, but it turns out not to be coconuts?!

string-array.name: str_brick3
string-array.item: The pumpkin is big enough to feed a family of three for a month.

string-array.name: str_brick1
string-array.item: It seems to process magical powers that boost attack strength.

string-array.name: str_brick4
string-array.item: A gigantic stiff column with ancient carvings.

string-array.name: pay_paypal
string-array.item: Best for choice for PayPal users

string-array.name: pay_checkout
string-array.item: Find it with Google. Buy it with Google Checkout.

string-array.name: openning_des
string-array.item: It has been said that after the Third Great War between the Guardians and Demons,
the power of the gods were reshuffled and the power to control the mortal world were redistributed amongst different forces.
According to legend, there are objects in the mortal that will alter these powers, whoever possesses these items will have dominant control over the mortal world.
And the legendary Dragon King, Arragon, possessed of the core items......
Not one of them has anything to do with your empire......

string-array.name: openning_des_2nd
string-array.item: then piled up a snowman nearby
No more worries of running out icecream

string-array.name: friend_conquer_invite
string-array.item: Your friend $0 wish to share victory with you, joint him in fighting $1!
"Your friend $0 wish to share victory with you, joint him in fighting $1! The weather out there is just too perfect, your friend $0 decides to go outing, let's forget the attack on $1."
"Your friend $0 wish to share victory with you, joint him in fighting $1! Your troops is now successfully in convergence with $0's."
"Your friend $0 wish to share victory with you, joint him in fighting $1! It's critical condition now, $0 can't wait for you anymore, they have to go first."
"Your friend $0 wish to share victory with you, joint him in fighting $1! God redeems that the best timing for attacking enemy is gone, $0 is so ordered to cancel this attack!"

string-array.name: str_task1
string-array.item: Select the Prison Cell and choose a target player to attack. He/she will become your hostage and do your labor.

string-array.name: str_task3
string-array.item: Recruit the new unit! Select the Barrack, tap on the upgrade icon and you will soon find these spear wielding trolls in the recruit panel.

string-array.name: str_task6
string-array.item: We need more units. Construct a Shooters Range to recruit these elves with great attack range.

string-array.name: str_task32
string-array.item: The Return of Bad Mouth Carl
Bad Mouth Carl is indeed very persistent, this time he strikes again with even more troops.

string-array.name: str_task33
string-array.item: Need a medic? Construct a Magic Library to recruit these Priests with healing ability.

string-array.name: str_task36
string-array.item: Shamans can cast powerful magic to accelerate units, best put at the center of the troops.

string-array.name: str_task37
string-array.item: Even after all those defeats, Bad Mouth Carl seems to have a never-lasting army. Muster your courage and become a true conqueror.

string-array.name: str_task39
string-array.item: Archers are powerful, but here comes their nightmare.

string-array.name: str_task42
string-array.item: Yes, they are very terrifying, but with enough gold, you can be their master. Upgrade the Stable to recruit them.

string-array.name: str_task45
string-array.item: Want to freeze your enemies? Recruit these advanced mages with the ability to cast frost magic.

string-array.name: str_task48
string-array.item: Using the weaknesses of different units to our advantage is the key to winning. We recommend arranging a combination of knights and archers.

string-array.name: str_task49
string-array.item: We should seize this opportunity to strike the fleeing enemy! Our chance of winning increases when more units are deployed.

string-array.name: str_task50
string-array.item: Find the Barrack to start recruiting. Need more population room? Use the construction panel to build more Red-shingled Houses.

string-array.name: str_task51
string-array.item: Beginner units are still very useful, even great magic spells can be interrupted by swift arrows. We recommend using archers against mages.

string-array.name: str_task52
string-array.item: Unit combination is very important. We recommend arranging the trolls to attack behind the footmen to fully utilize their spears.

string-array.name: str_task53
string-array.item: Archers are very powerful long-range units, but they can only weep when faced against knights. We recommend using knights against archers.

string-array.name: str_task54
string-array.item: With the appearance of Mages, the once glamorous knights are rendered useless. Recommend using Mages against Knights.

string-array.name: str_task55
string-array.item: Archangels are unstoppable? I hear the howls of the wolf riders. We recommend using wolf riders against archangels.

string-array.name: str_task56
string-array.item: Need more gold to recruit units? Construct a gold mine and harvest 300 gold. Remember to use your MOJOs to speed things up!

string-array.name: str_task57
string-array.item: "Bad Mouth Carl has chosen a very defensive place to build his fortress, but there is no turning back now, let's fight!"

string-array.name: str_task58
string-array.item: The Savage Army is coming to rob us again! Remember to select your hero at the bottom left, he/she will provide great help.

string-array.name: str_task59
string-array.item: "Using your hero's ability wisely will help you win the battle with ease. The ability is ready to use once the icon is lit."

string-array.name: str_task60
string-array.item: "A group of trolls appears! Don't worry, as usual, we will give each of them a good old beating."

string-array.name: str_task61
string-array.item: You have bullied the minions of Bad Mouth Carl again. Bad news this time, they have brought a full army of swords and spears, including archers!

string-array.name: str_task62
string-array.item: Caution! The head of the Savage Army, Bad Mouth Carl, was found nearby. He is a well-known outlaw, this should be exciting.

string-array.name: str_task63
string-array.item: Help! Our castle has been invaded. Hurry, send troops to rescue us!

string-array.name: str_task64
string-array.item: "It appears that various remnant of Bad Mouth Carl's Army has gathered outside the castle. Let's drive them back."

string-array.name: str_task65
string-array.item: Bad Mouth Carl holds a great grudge against us, they came without a warning again.

string-array.name: str_task66
string-array.item: Bad Mouth Carl had arranged a sneak attack and injured many villagers. Deploy troops to drive them back.

string-array.name: str_task67
string-array.item: This time they have also deployed a team of healing priests. Hang in there.

string-array.name: str_task68
string-array.item: Just rested for a few days and Bad Mouth Carl is coming back again. It seems he is coming after our crystals.

string-array.name: str_task70
string-array.item: Carl has brought his pirate friend, Captain Jack, to help. Jack is not easy to handle. Be careful this time, my master.

string-array.name: str_task71
string-array.item: With the support of our priests, our army has become unstoppable!

string-array.name: str_task72
string-array.item: A large army of elves are closing in. They must be coming for vengeance.

string-array.name: str_task73
string-array.item: A horde of Savage riders are outside the castle! The fog of war has clouded the sky.

string-array.name: str_task74
string-array.item: Who would have thought that Bad Mouth Carl and Captain Jack are brothers? We have been ambushed by them!

string-array.name: str_task75
string-array.item: "Even after defeating Carl's outpost units, his army doesn't seem to be diminishing."

string-array.name: str_task76
string-array.item: Long-time no see, Bad Mouth Carl! I can still recognize you through that new armor.

string-array.name: str_task77
string-array.item: "Carl is fleeing again! We won't let him get away this time, death to those who stall us!"

string-array.name: str_task78
string-array.item: Huh? Even the wicked witch Pandora has come to aid them? Soldiers, charge!

string-array.name: str_task80
string-array.item: A place surrounded by mountains, perfect for Carls hideout.

string-array.name: str_task81
string-array.item: "After years of hard battle, we finally have the capacity to look for Bad Mouth Carl's hideout."

string-array.name: str_task82
string-array.item: Defeating Pandora is getting harder than expected. Where are these enemies coming from!?

string-array.name: str_task83
string-array.item: This army ahead seems to be willing to sacrifice their lives. Fortunately they are all close-ranged units.

string-array.name: str_task84
string-array.item: "They have switched to long-ranged units this time. The key is to get in close range quickly and remember each unit's weakness."

string-array.name: str_task85
string-array.item: What? An army of Pandoras!? This must be some sort of magical illusion.

string-array.name: str_task86
string-array.item: They seems to be unbeatable, we need a bit more luck.

string-array.name: str_task87
string-array.item: We are finally here to capture this wicked witch. There is no time for hesitation.

string-array.name: str_task88
string-array.item: "This is Jack's fortress. Bad Mouth Carl won't be far after we win this battle."

string-array.name: str_task89
string-array.item: "By getting rid of Carl's wingman, we are taking a step closer to victory!"

string-array.name: str_task90
string-array.item: "A pirate's outfit... Captain Jack, we met again old friend."

string-array.name: str_task91
string-array.item: A horde of archangels! Bad Mouth Carl has sent out his strongest team.

string-array.name: str_task92
string-array.item: This is a squad of steel giants! Hang in there!

string-array.name: str_task93
string-array.item: "All of Carl's mages are on the move, where are our archers?"

string-array.name: str_task94
string-array.item: Knights! We are calling for our knights.

string-array.name: str_task95
string-array.item: Where are our mages? Prepare your staffs!

string-array.name: str_task96
string-array.item: Carl is getting irritated. He is sending these troops for a suicide mission.

string-array.name: str_task97
string-array.item: I can already imagine what a chaotic battle it would be.

string-array.name: str_task98
string-array.item: Finally, it is time to say good bye. A true hero returns to finish what he/she started.

string-array.name: str_task101
string-array.item: Captain Jack has come to raid the castle. He is a master of guerrilla warfare.

string-array.name: str_task102
string-array.item: Clear away the surrounding mercenaries to ensure the safe development of the country.

string-array.name: str_task103
string-array.item: It is a long and bumpy road ahead, but we are more confident than ever.

string-array.name: str_task104
string-array.item: Arranging close range units at the front, long range units at the back is the basic formation strategy.

string-array.name: str_task105
string-array.item: More experiences are gained in engaging battles.

string-array.name: str_task106
string-array.item: Use shamans to speed up our troops so that they can penetrate any defense.

string-array.name: str_task107
string-array.item: With these lightning-fast units, our raids against other countries will only get easier.

string-array.name: str_task108
string-array.item: Sound the horn of conquest, the battlefield is only our playground!

string-array.name: str_task112
string-array.item: "We need a stronger army to break through Bad Mouth Carl's fortress, let's summon the archangels. Upgrade Magic Temple to level 4"

string-array.name: str_task113
string-array.item: These steel giants will help clear away any obstacles that are blocking our road to victory.

string-array.name: str_task116
string-array.item: A horde of trolls appears! Use magic spells to break their formation.

string-array.name: str_task117
string-array.item: The Savage minions that you have just defeated brought new units to seek revenge!

string-array.name: str_task118
string-array.item: Even though we are outnumbered, we can destroy their fortress if we concentrate our effort on clearing out a path.

string-array.name: str_task119
string-array.item: Looks like Bad Mouth Carl has deployed a scouting team to test our ability.

string-array.name: str_task120
string-array.item: "Don't underestimate us. Let's show them our true strength."

string-array.name: str_task121
string-array.item: "With the help of these elves, let's crush the spirit of our enemies."

string-array.name: str_task122
string-array.item: Keep in mind that close range units are stronger and should be arranged at the front of the formation.

string-array.name: str_task123
string-array.item: "It is vital to stay calm during a battle and cast spells at the right time, don't waste hero's mana."

string-array.name: str_task125
string-array.item: "Priests are very weak units. They don't have helmets or armor and must be put behind other units."

string-array.name: str_task126
string-array.item: What are these green-skinned fellows jumping up and down for? Could they be the legendary shaman priests?

string-array.name: str_task127
string-array.item: "Why have the enemies' attack speed increased? This is all due to the weird spells that the shamans are casting."

string-array.name: str_task128
string-array.item: Odd, I was just eating an ice-cream, why is it suddenly snowing?

string-array.name: str_task129
string-array.item: Archers have an advantage in suppressing these Mages, give it a try.

string-array.name: str_task130
string-array.item: You have defended your kingdom. Would you tell me your name? It shall be remembered.

string-array.name: str_task131
string-array.item: Tap on your castle, select the formation icon. Arrange your troops in front of the castle to protect it from enemies.

string-array.name: str_task132
string-array.item: A group of mysterious units from the east, they cover their faces and wield strange weapons. Upgrade the Shooters Range to level 3 to recruit them.

string-array.name: str_task133
string-array.item: Ouch! These darts are very annoying, please get rid of these ninjas quickly.

string-array.name: str_task134
string-array.item: The fallen units will turn into zombies, fortunately we have enough archers.

string-array.name: str_task135
string-array.item: Defend the fortress and smite the army of zombies.

string-array.name: str_task136
string-array.item: Blonde hair, green eyes and armed with a heavy bow? Who are these agile new foes?

string-array.name: str_task137
string-array.item: "Pew! Pew! That was close! My ears would have been sliced off if I haven't dodged in time."

string-array.name: str_task139
string-array.item: Open the construction panel, build a Prison Cell, then raid and capture another player to do your labor!

string-array.name: str_task141
string-array.item: Construct a Shooters Range to recruit these elf archers.

string-array.name: str_task142
string-array.item: Want to become a priest? You need to start by reading spell books.

string-array.name: str_task144
string-array.item: "I like riders, but it's a pain to feed these four-legged beasts."

string-array.name: str_task145
string-array.item: I feel dizzy just to see all these bookshelves, you will certainly grow a long white beard after staying here too long.

string-array.name: str_task146
string-array.item: Ding, Ding, Ding. What time is it? Do these mechanical freaks ever take a break?

string-array.name: str_task147
string-array.item: You need more land to establish a grand empire. Select the windmill to expand your empire.

string-array.name: str_task148
string-array.item: Select the build icon and construct a Gold Mine to start harvesting gold.

string-array.name: str_task149
string-array.item: Select the build icon and construct a Crystal Mine to start harvesting crystal.

string-array.name: str_task150
string-array.item: These blue crystals contain magical powers, handle with caution.

string-array.name: str_task152
string-array.item: Feeling generous? You can help rescue your friend when you see his/her SOS sign is on.

string-array.name: str_task153
string-array.item: Select the shield icon and choose an opponent to fight. You will gain points and advance your rankings.

string-array.name: str_task154
string-array.item: "Doesn't your friend's resources look tempting? Go ahead, no one is watching."

string-array.name: str_task155
string-array.item: Those who have seen it gave the same remark: the perfect long-range weapon for killing and destruction.

string-array.name: str_task157
string-array.item: The reappearance of the ancient troll machinery has brought nightmares to the battlefield. These machines are merciless and unstoppable.

string-array.name: str_task158
string-array.item: Sharp arrows are blended with a rain of steel bullets, reaping the lives of countless soldiers.

string-array.name: str_task159
string-array.item: Iron knights charges as steel bullets flies. They leave behind cries of suffering.

string-array.name: str_task160
string-array.item: The reappearance of the iron formation will certainly bring more blood and rain.

string-array.name: str_task161
string-array.item: You should make a wish. Huh? You wish to stay alive? Well, that is going to be difficult...

string-array.name: str_task162
string-array.item: Giant armored machines combined with powerful magic casters, the team of giants are ready to strike.

string-array.name: str_task163
string-array.item: Jack has recruited new units onto the battlefield, they are armed with advanced weapons.

string-array.name: str_task165
string-array.item: Bad Mouth has put himself at the front line and rallied his troops to prepare against the intruders.

string-array.name: str_task166
string-array.item: The once unstoppable Jack has never before tasted defeat, the anger has given him an uncontrollable urge to kill.

string-array.name: str_task167
string-array.item: There is always a strange shadow lurking amongst the enemies, who is she?

string-array.name: str_task168
string-array.item: A battle-scarred hero is using his/her own way to teach everyone the true wisdom of war.

string-array.name: str_task169
string-array.item: "Click on the top left player avatar to open the player information page. Click on the signature box to enter your personal greeting, for example, DON'T STEAL MY GOODIES! You can also change your password/avatar or reset your game here."

string-array.name: str_task170
string-array.item: "Click on the shiny statue on the map and select check to open the hero panel. You can drag the items your just won/bought onto the item slots to equip your hero. Doesn't your hero look way more awesome now?"

string-array.name: str_task171
string-array.item: After building a prison cell, you are ready to capture another player. Select the prison cell on the map and choose an unlucky player to raid with your troops.

string-array.name: str_task188
string-array.item: This time, we will nail it!

string-array.name: str_task189
string-array.item: Helping others is another way of helping yourself.

string-array.name: str_task190
string-array.item: Take as much as I please, no worries about gold and crystals anymore!

string-array.name: str_task191
string-array.item: The defence power has been leveled up.

string-array.name: str_task192
string-array.item: Protection is crucial for a healthy growth.Choose the famation after you click the fort building. And then press the army-shift button. You can set use the army of castle now.

string-array.name: str_task194
string-array.item: Perfect fusion of magic and tech, interaction of time and space.

string-array.name: str_task195
string-array.item: The new strength is emerging, the mysterious troops go first.

string-array.name: str_task196
string-array.item: A black clothed death smiles at the veil of blood, here comes Juster!

string-array.name: str_task197
string-array.item: Is this a gangster movie or something?

string-array.name: str_task199
string-array.item: Alive or dead, Jack and Carl, always the losers!

string-array.name: str_task200
string-array.item: "Puppet has achived second stage. That's fast!"

string-array.name: str_task201
string-array.item: The evil force has crashed the last shackle of the War Spirit, the pinnacle of war is coming!

string-array.name: str_task202
string-array.item: Guess who comes after Carl and Jack?

string-array.name: str_task203
string-array.item: The complete Pandora, what a nightmare!

string-array.name: str_task204
string-array.item: "With The new castle, everything will be started over. But safety always comes first, let's begin defense now!"

string-array.name: str_task205
string-array.item: First step to recruit footman is to have a barrack.

string-array.name: str_task206
string-array.item: OK! Let us check the arena and tell them who the king of fighters is.

string-array.name: str_task207
string-array.item: When you find the gold mine in the fort, you will know that this is a good place!

string-array.name: str_task8
string-array.item: It always feels great to harvest your first pot of gold.

string-array.name: str_task9
string-array.item: By using MOJO, time goes by faster!

string-array.name: str_task10
string-array.item: Remember to collect your gold on time to prevent your friends from stealing them.

string-array.name: str_task11
string-array.item: If the first thing you do after waking up is to collect gold, then you have become a gold collecting master.

string-array.name: str_task12
string-array.item: Visit your friends often to receive unexpected gifts!

string-array.name: str_task13
string-array.item: Have an urge to steal more? Go add more friends!

string-array.name: str_task14
string-array.item: "Hourglasses are great, but don't get addicted!"

string-array.name: str_task15
string-array.item: Time is going so fast that my eyes are getting blurry

string-array.name: str_task16
string-array.item: You will be amongst the thief masters after you have completed this task.

string-array.name: str_task18
string-array.item: A true hero never turns away once the battle has started.

string-array.name: str_task19
string-array.item: So you think have a strong army? Go prove yourself in the arena.

string-array.name: str_task20
string-array.item: After your first victory in the arena, no one can call you an amateur again.

string-array.name: str_task21
string-array.item: "One victory doesn't prove anything. You have to keep challenging yourself."

string-array.name: str_task22
string-array.item: How does it feel to be on a winning streak? Want to go again?

string-array.name: str_task23
string-array.item: "Occupy another player's castle to collect tax."

string-array.name: str_task24
string-array.item: Occupy your opponents while they are producing units or resources to get the most benefit.

string-array.name: str_task25
string-array.item: More occupied countries means more tax income.

string-array.name: str_task26
string-array.item: Rescue your friends not only for the rewards but also for their trust.

string-array.name: str_task27
string-array.item: Doing good deeds without asking for anything in return is a basic principle of a saviour.

string-array.name: str_task29
string-array.item: Crystals are essential for recruiting advanced units, even more valuable than gold.

string-array.name: str_task30
string-array.item: These shiny crystals contains great magical power, its shine will blind those who are weak.

string-array.name: str_task31
string-array.item: The lust for crystals can never be satisfied!

string-array.name: str_task172
string-array.item: Your personality is impressively shinning glitter.

string-array.name: str_task173
string-array.item: Your dominance is all over the neighbordhood, you are so invincible!

string-array.name: str_task174
string-array.item: Your follwers are all over the world, and the order would scare heaven and earth!

string-array.name: str_task176
string-array.item: Totally half the work twice the results!

string-array.name: str_task177
string-array.item: OMG, that just felt like a second ago!

string-array.name: str_task179
string-array.item: "Just don't give a damn about money!"

string-array.name: str_task180
string-array.item: You are obviously super something after this mission being completed.

string-array.name: str_task181
string-array.item: Where there is a fire, there is me.

string-array.name: str_task182
string-array.item: This fire is just a piece of cake!

string-array.name: str_task183
string-array.item: The title is crowned by them, not my invention.

string-array.name: str_task184
string-array.item: Wana get in? Pass me first!

string-array.name: str_task185
string-array.item: Anyone wants to break in here, I will make sure they regret!

string-array.name: str_hero_orc
string-array.item: A legendary orc who battled against the humans and elves, he lost his jaw and replaced it with steel. He specializes in defense and should be stationed at the front line.

string-array.name: str_hero_sparta
string-array.item: A 300-year-old prince of a long-lost human empire, his scars painfully reminds him of what he has lost. He specializes in combat and should be stationed at the center.

string-array.name: str_hero_witch
string-array.item: A fallen spirit that wanders between the shadow realms, consuming souls is her only passion. She has long attack range and should be stationed at the rear.
